price: 8. And they had no fault except that they believed in Allâh, the All-Mighty, Worthy of all Praise!
arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wamā naqamū min'hum illā an yu'minū bil-lahi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥamīdi
